
Parameter groups
common.params-completion [ 2 parameters, all hidden ]
    These are the parameters concerned with specifying and creating shell
    completion functions. There are parameters for specifying which directory
    the completion files should be written to, for triggering the generation of
    the files and for specifying whether they should be overwritten.
    
    Parameters in this group may also be set in the configuration file:
    /home/ngw/.config/github.com/nickwells/param.mod/v3/param/phelp/group-common.params-completion.cfg

---------------
common.params-help [ 12 parameters, 11 hidden ]
    These are parameters which control whether and how to print a message
    explaining how the program can be used.

---------------
common.params-params [ 6 parameters, all hidden ]
    These are the parameter-handling parameters. There are parameters for
    showing where parameters have been set and for the handling of parameter
    errors.

---------------
test-group1 [ 6 parameters, 1 hidden ]
    test parameters.
